definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
to hold/to grasp/to support/to maintain/to persevere/to manage/to run (i.e. administer)/to control

sentences.english: Bearings allow the shaft to turn while permitting the housing to remain still.
sentences.chinese: 轴承允许传动轴转动的同时允许壳体保持静止。

sentences.english: And they protect against soil erosion by holding moisture in the ground.
sentences.chinese: 树木还能保持水分防止土壤侵蚀。

sentences.english: Iron corrodes unless it is greased or kept clean.
sentences.chinese: 如果不涂油或保持清洁铁便会腐蚀。

sentences.english: For years, the government has been buoying up cotton prices.
sentences.chinese: 多年来政府一直保持棉花高价格。

sentences.english: Keep your body in a neutral position.
sentences.chinese: 保持你的身体在一个中立的立场。

sentences.english: I've been keeping my room as neat as a pin, and the yard is always ship-shape.
sentences.chinese: 我一直保持房间井然有序，院子也是修得井井有条的。

sentences.english: In technical side, short and mid-term technical indicators keep on rise.
sentences.chinese: 技术面，短期及中期各项技术指标保持多头强势状态。

sentences.english: It stands apart with small creatures near its roots.
sentences.chinese: 它站在这里，与树下的小动物保持着距离。

sentences.english: And light multitaskers might be better at preserving their attention.
sentences.chinese: 并且轻度的一心多用者可能更擅长保持注意力。

sentences.english: Eat fat food less, no-noSmokeWine, answer to often maintain defecate unobstructed .
sentences.chinese: 少吃油腻食物，禁忌烟酒，并应经常保持大便通畅。

sentences.english: Lateef says conditions like these keep small farmers in poverty.
sentences.chinese: Lateef女士说，像这样的条件下保持贫穷小农。

sentences.english: Keep the cable coils stacked in the same order as they were when they were on the drum.
sentences.chinese: 在鼓轮上保持钢索盘的旋转方向与原来一致。

sentences.english: Have you remained silent in an English conversation because you were afraid of saying something wrong?
sentences.chinese: 你是否因为担心自己会讲错英文而在交流时保持沉默？

sentences.english: Will governments in the region maintain and even increase state ownership of financial institutions?
sentences.chinese: 这些地区的政府会保持甚至增容其国有金融机构吗？

sentences.english: They act as small laminated springs and keep the belt strap flat.
sentences.chinese: 它们可以充当小小的叠片弹簧，让安全带保持平整度。

sentences.english: Only few States continue to maintain a separate chancery court.
sentences.chinese: 只有少数几个州继续保持独立的衡平法院。

definition: guarantee/to guarantee/to ensure/to safeguard/to pledge/CL:個|个[ge4]
to keep/to retain/to have reservations (about sth)/to hold back (from saying sth)/to put aside for later
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
